mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.address AS "address", a.contact AS "contact", a.phone AS "phone", a.remark AS "remark", a.used_flag AS "usedFlag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_customer a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
AND a.contact LIKE '%'||#{contact}||'%' '%'+#{contact}+'%' concat('%',#{contact},'%')
AND a.phone LIKE '%'||#{phone}||'%' '%'+#{phone}+'%' concat('%',#{phone},'%')
AND a.remark LIKE '%'||#{remark}||'%' '%'+#{remark}+'%' concat('%',#{remark},'%')
AND a.used_flag = #{usedFlag}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_customer( id, name, address, contact, phone, remark, used_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{phone}, #{remark}, #{usedFlag}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_customer SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, phone = #{phone}, remark = #{remark}, used_flag = #{usedFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_customer a
WHERE a.name = #{name} and a.del_flag = 0
